msbt.message: Ah, I see you've noticed my custom bug net.Yep, it's inlaid with 18-karat gold and it has my name bedazzled across the handle in cubic zirconia. Does any of that help me catch bugs? <10_4 />You bet it does!
This? Oh, this is just my custom fishing rod.Yep, I've got the torque dialed just where I like it, a comfort grip, and a little flair to make it my own. And it hasn't helped me catch a single fish,
You know what I like about gardening? The flowers don't judge anyone. And they don't care if I harshly judge THEM. Like, be bluer, hydrangea! Are you even trying?!
If you ask me, this umbrella is where fashion meets function.It's a stylish accessory that actually protects your hairstyle from the weather! , it's genius!
